body.p: This version of the TEI Guidelines introduces new features and resolves a number of issues raised by the TEI community. As always, the majority of these changes and corrections are a consequence of feature requests or bugs reported by the TEI community using the SourceForge tracking system. If you find something you think needs to change in the TEI Guidelines, schemas, tools, or website, please submit a feature request or bug ticket at http://tei.sf.net/ for consideration. Lists of closed bugs and closed feature requests are available on the site.

In addition, the XSL stylesheets (which provide processing of TEI ODD files for Roma and OxGarage as well as other TEI conversions) have been updated, notably providing better support for multi-namespace ODD. The Stylesheets are being maintained separately from the Guidelines and are at https://github.com/TEIC/Stylesheets.
